name: A Roll-Back Story (itch)
description:
• Story:This is a story of two nation. Just like every other story one nation attacked the other one. The attacked nation is in turmoils. Our hero appears out of nowhere to save the day. But little did he know the game developer was not on his side. Can our hero overcome the hardships and save his nation? Find that out by guiding our hero on his epic journey.
  • Game Play:Guide the ball left or right and jump to make progress. You might have to interact with the world as well.
